sidebar.title: Sign Up with AYP Global Pay
sidebar.subtitle: Get started by creating your AYP Global Pay account.
sidebar.description: Hire global talents at any time, and onboard and work from anywhere. Manage and pay automatically, accurately, and efficiently. With AYP Global Pay, the world is just a tap away.

emailVerification.title: Verify email
emailVerification.description: You will receive a verification email in your inbox. Do check your spam folder if it doesn't arrive in your inbox.
